colombia_special_api_identity_lookup.title: 哥伦比亚 - 私人公民信息
colombia_special_api_identity_lookup.description: 访问私人公民信息 为 Colombian nationals. 此服务提供全面的个人数据 包括 detailed identity verification. 联系Verifik客户服务了解更多详情.

colombia_api_identity_lookup.title: 哥伦比亚 - 国民身份证验证
colombia_api_identity_lookup.description: 验证 Colombian national ID (cédula) information. 获取 full name, document status, and basic citizen verification data.

colombia_special_api_police_identity_loo.title: 哥伦比亚 - 警察记录查询
colombia_special_api_police_identity_loo.description: 检查 police records through Colombia's National Police system. 验证 interactions with law enforcement and police records. 需要 document type, document number, and expedition date.

world_api_dea.title: 全球 - DEA背景调查
world_api_dea.description: Comprehensive background check service using DEA (Drug Enforcement Administration) databases. 搜索 by full name OR document number with document type. 验证 individuals against international drug enforcement records.

colombia_api_military_situation.title: Colombia - 军事服务记录
colombia_api_military_situation.description: 验证 military service records through Colombia's military system. 检查 service status, military obligations, and service records. 需要 Colombian ID (CC) and document number.

colombia_api_rethus.title: Colombia - 健康记录验证
colombia_api_rethus.description: Access Colombian health records through Rethus system. 验证 medical history, health status, and healthcare provider information. 需要 document type (CC, CE, PPT) and document number.

colombia_api_rues.title: Colombia - 公司注册验证
colombia_api_rues.description: 验证 company registration through Colombia's RUES (Registro Único Empresarial y Social) system. 检查 business registration, legal status, and company information. 需要 document type and document number.

colombia_api_dian.title: Colombia - 税务信息验证
colombia_api_dian.description: 验证 tax information through Colombia's DIAN (Dirección de Impuestos y Aduanas Nacionales) system. 检查 tax status, obligations, and compliance records. 需要 document type and document number.
